reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor who makes complex topics easy to understand. His lectures are well-organized, and he encourages student participation.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Davis knows her material but can be a bit fast-paced. Be prepared to study outside of class to keep up.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is one of the best professors I've had. She genuinely cares about her students' success and makes herself available for extra help.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is passionate about history and brings a lot of enthusiasm to his lectures. The assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a great teacher who explains concepts clearly and makes sure everyone understands before moving on. Her exams are tough but fair.
